title: (x) Gandolfo's New York Delicatessen - ITC Kabel {Tiff (self)}
content:
Just shoot me now! I cannot figure it out. Please don’t tease me too harshly.

It is the logo. [http://www.gandolfosdeli.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127220322/http:/www.gandolfosdeli.com/)
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: ahaha. ahem. no really. i need this id. puhlease.
No, I was serious…Bully Narrow Bold is the name of the font. It’s also used for RagingBull.com, which is how I remember the name.

Here’s a link for a very cheap download of the face:

[Link removed by Moderator]

Ha, I didn’t even realize until your reply that my comment could be seen as so snarky! Pretty funny.

_Just shoot me now! I cannot figure it out._

Tiff,  
Guess we won’t have to shoot you anyhow!

_Thinking is more interesting that knowing, but less interesting than looking._ — Goethe

—————————————————————————————-  
Yes, I’m old, but I look interesting!
